resources.string: Please wait while Hutch ELD connects to your vehicle!
Connection is established successfully! Please click on OK button to continue!
We are sorry, connection failed. Please contact Hutch System!
Please click on Next to continue!
I found no defect in my vehicle.
Platform does not support deleting aiding data.

Platform does not support injecting XTRA data.

Time between GPS fixes, in seconds
Prevents the screen from turning off
Sets the type of map tiles shown
Change the map orientation based on your direction
Shows instructions for using the app
Change to a first-person map view when you hold up the device
Compass will face true north instead of magnetic north
Edited or entered by the Driver

Defect(s) found in DVIR not need to be corrected for safe operation of the vehicle.
Hutch System has detected following protocol on your vehicle
We are sorry, connection with the vehicle could not be established. Please contact Hutch System!

The On/Off switch starts/stops GPS
 The "Share" button sends a location (shown after getting a GPS fix)

 (tap to dismiss)

Hutch Systems owns or licenses certain technology that it has developed and makes commercially available to users through mobile services and/or web applications to assist in efficient operations of truck and motor coach fleets in North America. In connection with the use of the Applications and the provision of Support, or the purchase or rental of Hardware (all as further defined below), you and/or your organization or corporation (the Customer) hereby agree to the terms of service and conditions contained herein (collectively, the Terms of Service).
